pages.text: $(li)The Illager King is a greedy creature that lives in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_tower)Illager Tower$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you manage to reach to his room, it will attacks you desperately with his axe.$(br)$(li)It may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/redstone)Redstone Dust$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/lapis_lazuli)Lapis Lazuli$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/diamond)Diamonds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/experience_bottle)Bottle o' Enchanting$(/l) and even his $(l:patchouli:weapons/iron_axe)Axe$(/l) upon death.
